s: I enjoy Fourplay tremendously but I'm certainly not a sound engineer. Having said that, this recording is clearly superior to the original release in every way. The main thing that I noticed is that the base sound volume is much lowder than the original. This makes the detail in the music much more accessible, in my opinion, even if listening on a standard CD player. ... Quad mix is sounding good. Excellent music ... Cette version vinyle ...
